name: 12_20_16_Corpo
subject: Show the last minute who’s boss.

blocks.text: The weekend. That bad boy sells itself. It’s awesome. So cut loose with some favorites for off-days. We’ve got something for every weekend plan, from partying hard to spending some much-needed quality time on your couch.

name: 12_16_16_Etsy
subject: Joy To Your World. Beer To Your Door.

blocks.headline: Beer. Wine. Liquor. Delivered.
blocks.text: Stumped on that last minute gift? Consider it done. Use Drizly to shop the largest selection online of beer, wine and liquor. With just a few clicks you can have your favorite bottle delivered right to your door. No markups, No Hassle.
Use Code ETSY5 at checkout to save $5 on your first order!

There are two crucial things to pack for a ski weekend —skis/snowboard and booze. Renting? Drinks are priority number one. Because beverages are necessary as soon as you step out of your skis. They also make great company if you choose the fireplace over the mountain.
Pack some of these picks to stay cozy and soothe sore legs.

blocks.alt: Ring It In Like A Champ.

blocks.text: New Year’s Eve means two things—hype and champagne. At least your night can’t disappoint if you’ve got enough bubbly. But what to buy?
blocks.headline: Pop Bottles.

blocks.text: Cava and Prosecco are just as bubbly. And delicious.
blocks.headline: Don’t stick to Champagne:

blocks.text: You’ll be filling glasses all night. The pricey stuff adds up.
blocks.headline: Try a few price points:
Discover your favorite flavor:
blocks.text: Brut means dry. Sec means sweet. There’s a world of possibility in between.

blocks.headline: Grab the good stuff.
blocks.text: The Bachelor Is Back. Order a bottle of your favorite vino and watch the premiere Monday Jan 2 at 8/7c on ABC.

name: 12_30_16_NYE_NonBuyer
subject: Avoid the NYE rush. And save $5.

blocks.headline: Ring in 2017 with Drizly.
blocks.text: We’ll deliver whatever alcohol you need for your New Year’s Eve party. But if you need someone to kiss at midnight, you’ll have to look elsewhere.
Don't miss out, get $15 off your first Drizly order of $30 or more with the promo code HELLO2017. We've got a few suggestions for your celebration below.
*Offer only valid in CA, CO, D.C., FL, IL, LA, NY. 1st purchase only. Order minimum $30. Expires 1/1/2017.

name: 12_30_16_NYE_Lapsed
subject: Avoid the NYE rush. And save $5.

blocks.headline: Ring in 2017 with Drizly.
blocks.text: New year, new you... like the 'you' who knows how cool it is when alcohol gets delivered to your door.
Actually, rediscover it right now. Save $5 on your New Year’s Drizly order with the promo code SEEYALATER16 . We’ve got a few suggestions for your celebration below.

name: 12_30_16_NYE_BUYER
subject: The store is going to be mobbed.

blocks.headline: Ring in 2017 with Drizly.
blocks.text: We’ll deliver whatever alcohol you need for your New Year’s Eve party. But if you need someone to kiss at midnight, you’ll have to look elsewhere.
Kiss or not, your celebration will be incredible if you order some of the items we’ve suggested below.

name: 1_4_17_Corpo
subject: Order up for the New Year.

blocks.headline: Start The Year Off Right.
blocks.text: From promotions to parties, this year will be full of reasons for your company to celebrate. That’s where Drizly comes in. Whether you need a special bottle for a new client or help building a bulk order, we’re here for you.
Email Kim@Drizly.com to set your office up for 2017.

name: 1_6_17_Jan_Drinking_Calendar
subject: Your January Drinking Calendar Is Here

blocks.headline: Enter to win.
blocks.text: Will you be the winner of the Bud Light + Drizly Super Bowl LI Sweepstakes? Enter to find out. Here’s your code:
XYZCODE
Visit www.drizly.budlightsuperbowl51.com to enter your code no later than January 16, 2017.
Just for entering, you’ll get a code for $5 off your next Drizly purchase, including Bud Light or other alcoholic and non-alcoholic items.

name: MillerLite_Button_Activate
subject: Activate your exclusive Drizly button now!

blocks.headline: Click. Drink. Repeat.
blocks.text: You don’t ask questions when a beer button arrives in the mail. But here are some answers  anyway: We teamed with Miller Lite to test a new service, and we want your help.

The idea is simple enough. Press the button and a Drizly retailer will deliver Miller Lite to your  door. Other than drink beer and press a button from time to time, all you need to do is set up a  default order (instructions here, if you need them).
Only a few hundred beer buttons exist, making you and your feedback VIP. Send thoughts to  buttonfeedback@millerlite.com. We’d really appreciate it.
If beer at the touch of a button isn’t your thing, email support@drizly.com for a prepaid return  label. But we want to hammer it home one more time: It’s beer. At the touch of a button.
Check out the FAQ's page if you have any other questions. <https://drizly.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/sections/115000026363>.
Happy pressing.

blocks.headline: Enter to win.
blocks.text: Will you be the winner of the Bud Light + Drizly Super Bowl LI Sweepstakes? There’s only one way to find out.
Text “DRIZLY” to 55999 and you’ll receive a link in response. Follow the link to complete your entry no later than January 16, 2017.
Just for entering, you’ll get a code for $5 off your next Drizly purchase, including Bud Light or other alcoholic and non-alcoholic items.

blocks.alt: Make this the best year ever.

blocks.headline: Bring It On, 2017.
blocks.text: Welcome 2017 with open arms. And a full fridge. Because there will be lots of reasons to celebrate this year. You just don’t know when they’ll be. Make sure the office is ready for an impromptu party by stocking up on staples that always come in handy.
Email Kim@Drizly.com to set your office up for 2017.

name: 1_13_17_SkiTrip
subject: It’s all about the post-skiing drinks.

blocks.text: There are two crucial things to pack for a ski weekend —skis/snowboard and booze. Renting? Drinks are priority number one. Because beverages are necessary as soon as you step out of your skis. They also make great company if you choose the fireplace over the mountain.
Pack some of these picks to stay cozy and soothe sore legs.

With apologies to halftime, snacks are the best part of the Super Bowl. They’re why people talk more about the spread than the spread formation. (That’s a mediocre football joke to use during the big game, free of charge. You’re welcome.)

To enjoy more snacks, throw a Super Bowl-themed happy hour. Serve classics like wings and dips. Wear jerseys. Facilitate low-stakes gambling. Have Drizly’s drink picks delivered. Follow our tips for throwing an amazing Super Bowl party and no one will notice there’s no game.

Football fanatics. Halftime lovers. Snack addicts. Commercial critics. People watch the big game for all sorts of reasons. And their drink tastes are as varied as their motivations for viewing. So how do you buy booze for such a large group?

We’ve got you covered. Below are plenty of crowd-pleasers so you can place the perfect Drizly order way before kickoff.  Beer is a game-day staple, but make sure you’ve got some wine and enough mixers, too. Then everyone will enjoy whatever part of the night they like best.
